content.name: Faster Dialogue
content.description: Disables the hiding of further choices when Characters are still talking - thereby making Dialogue Navigation faster
content.author: UniTrader

text.name: Faster Dialogue
text.description: Disables the hiding of further choices when Characters are still talking - thereby making Dialogue Navigation faster
text.author: UniTrader

text.name: Schnellerer Dialog
text.description: Deaktiviert das verstecken weiterer Konversationspunkte während Charactere noch reden - und macht damit die Dialoge sehr viel schneller
text.author: UniTrader
